sentences.en: As regards John, I will write to him at once.
sentences.cn: 至于约翰, 我会立即给他去信.

sentences.en: As regards Luther, I will write to him at once.
sentences.cn: 至于卢瑟, 我会立即给他去信.

sentences.en: As regards the war, Haig believed in victory at any price.
sentences.cn: 至于这场战争，黑格认为要不惜任何代价取得胜利。

sentences.en: Be sure to give your family my regards.
sentences.cn: 一定要代我向你的家人问好.

sentences.en: David sends his warmest regards to your parents.
sentences.cn: 戴维向你的父母致以最热烈的问候.

sentences.en: Don't forget to convey my regards when you see him.
sentences.cn: 你去见着他,别忘了给我捎个好儿.

sentences.en: He always regards himself as an authority on arts.
sentences.cn: 他一向以艺术权威自居.

sentences.en: I have little information as regards his past.
sentences.cn: 我对他过去的情况不太了解.

sentences.en: I was touched to find that he regards me as engaging.
sentences.cn: 他认为我很迷人，这真令我感动。

sentences.en: It needs further discussion as regards how to revise the play.
sentences.cn: 这个剧本如何修改,尚待讨论.
请转达我对玛丽的良好祝愿。

sentences.en: Please give my best regards to him.
Please give my regards ( to sb. ) when you write.
sentences.cn: 写信时请替我带上一笔.

sentences.en: Please give my regards to him.
Please give my regards to your teacher.
sentences.cn: 请代我向你们老师问好.

sentences.en: Should you happen to see him, please give him my regards.
sentences.cn: 如果你碰巧见到他，请代我向他致意。

words.tran_cn: 视为，注意（regard的第三人称单数）

phrases.tran_cn: 诚挚的问候；最好的祝福；致敬

trans.tran_cn: 关系( regard的第三人称单数 )，注意，（尤指以某种方式）注视，尊敬
